div.p: I don’t think school’s for everyone, it certainly wasn’t for me; I had my struggles with school, certain lessons I’m not very into maths,
I’m not very mathematically-minded at all so yeah I definitely struggled and there’s lots of peer pressures and things which are hard to
sort of battle through but I think you just remember that it’s not for ever and you do get through it and learn whatever you can and that’s what
I tried to do learn whatever I could while I was there and then use it as best I could when I left.
My parents were very supportive, I think I was quite a difficult child so I don’t think it was very easy for them but they did keep
faith and you know punish me when I needed punishing and sort of encouraged me when I needed encouraging and helped point me in the right
direction really I was quite lucky I know not everyone has that but I was very lucky with that.
